definition: to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
lit. always with a book in hand (idiom)/fig. (of a student or scholar) diligent and hardworking

sentences.english: Although he was a military general, he was fond of reading.
sentences.chinese: 趙匡胤雖是一員武將，卻很喜愛讀書，常手不釋卷。

sentences.english: Should the eerie singularity, breathtaking, often it"s a wrench to comfort absorbing read."
sentences.chinese: 其情節詭異奇異，驚險安慰，經常令人不忍釋卷。
